content:
# Code Review Methodology
## Problem Restatement
Perform a code review to identify issues and provide suggestions for improvement.
## Optimal Solution
Use Git to check for code changes. If changes are detected, use a code review tool to analyze the changes and provide feedback. If no changes are detected, confirm that the codebase is up-to-date.
## Notes
Ensure that the code review tool is properly configured to detect and analyze changes accurately.
